ygData.subject: Status Code Priority
ygData.msgSnippet: Is there an accepted standard to resolve the order of status codes? A request may qualify for multiple status codes. For example: -- PUT /foo.rdf

Is there an accepted standard to resolve the order of status codes?

A requ=
est may qualify for multiple status codes. For example:

-->
PUT /foo.rdf
C=
ontent-Language: en
Content-Type: application/rdf+xml
<rdf:RDF/>

<--
201 C=
reated

-->
GET /foo.rdf
Accept: text/xml
Accept-Language: fr
If-Match: "xy=
zzy"

the GET might qualify for the following status codes:

404 Not Found
=
406 Not Acceptable
412 Precondition Failed

so, which to choose?

Regards, =
Alan Dean
